Package camzup.pfriendly

Class MaterialAwt

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.EntityData
camzup.core.Material
camzup.pfriendly.MaterialAwt
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntityData, IMaterial, IUtils
public class MaterialAwt
extends Material
A material which supports Images as textures.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  MaterialAwt.Sample
    Organizes the corners used to sample an image, expressed as integer pixel coordinates.

  • Field Summary

    Whether or not to display a shape with a stroke.
